Summary: sphere silver at first it later turned red and streeked off like something out of star trek
divs: Sighting Detailsit was september on a sunday in 1973 (approximate date) i was horse back riding that after noon it was getting late in the day so i headed home my family had to go to church that night as i turned my hours loose in the pasture i looked up tward the south south east and saw what looked like a silver sphere just setting in the sky there was no movement at all i thought that was strange because the wind was starting to blow because rain was trying to move into the area i watched it for some time and then i had to get ready for church i hurried so i could go back outside to watch it somemore i told my dad to come look and he said he thought it was a balloon of some kind but it still did not move even with the wind the way it was when we headed to church we had to drive 12 miles to paris arkansas because we lived in subiaco this thing paced us all the way when we arrived at church i went inside to get 2 of my friends when we came outside all 3 of us saw this thing turn red and streek out of sight
